title: The biggest issue with Ivern
body:
Ivern does not function well alone, and a lot of people like dicking around all over the map when playing. If you don't group and you don't have someone for Ivern to work with, Ivern is SHIT tier. If Ivern has some dudes and gals around him, he's a bit better.

He still needs buffs though, but even with buffs, you'll need teamwork to use this champ.

Side note: Rylai's makes Daisy's punches slow. Maybe RoA + Rylai's + Liandry's should be a thing on him?

Support Junglers are really strong when played right as long as you don't try and kill things yourself.  I find them stronger to carry than a gank jungler like Lee Sin in some elo metas.

As is, he functions very well as a secondary protector for his carries. Atm I'm lvl 5 with him with about a 65%+ win rate - With full support Ivern in low Elo.
